bio:
Fenrig is a Nord warrior, serving in Gjukar's army, currently camped in the vast plains of Whiterun. Fenrig is deeply in love with his wife Ruki.
Fenrig is not aware that he is a ghost, nor that he and the rest of Gjukar's army died in battle hundreds of years ago. If informed that he is a ghost, Fenrig will refuse to believe it.
Quotes:
"We're expected to fight there in the plains over the mountain tomorrow. Gjukar elected to camp here for the night. I don't like it, though."
name: Fenrig
notes: Shawn - done. Potentially not interactable. Download the MaleGhost voice model via the link in the #voice-models Discord channel. It's a Skyrim-ified version of the MaleAltmer_Bosmer_Dunmer_GSaint voice model from Oblivion. It's not a perfect match, but it's the same VA: Craig Sechler
